sentences.english: The Four Wonders of the Huangshan Mountain are absolutely breathtaking. I felt as if I had been in a different world.
sentences.chinese: 黃山的四絕真神奇，我感覺好像置身於一個世外桃源。

sentences.english: Here in this pretty world Gallantry too its last bow.
sentences.chinese: 曾有一羣雅士在此世外桃源享受最後的昇平。

sentences.english: What about making it a sanctuary for humanity and nature?
sentences.chinese: 這裏是一個獨一無二的人類和自然共有的世外桃源。

sentences.english: Possibly his original intention was simply to cover marvel's retreat.
sentences.chinese: 也許他原意很簡單，就是想隱藏這個世外桃源。
北海真是一個世外桃源。

sentences.english: Here folkway is simple, and has the name of xanadu.
sentences.chinese: 這裏民風淳樸，有“世外桃源”之稱。
還要擁有一個世外桃源。

sentences.english: Looking back at it, it seems now an idyllic world.
sentences.chinese: 現在回望過去，當時的世界就像一個世外桃源。

sentences.english: It is considered by many as the paradise island of the paradise that is the Caribbean.
sentences.chinese: 這是許多人認爲的天堂島的世外桃源，是加勒比地區。

sentences.english: Switzerland was an enclave of peace in war-torn Europe.
sentences.chinese: 在飽經戰爭磨難的歐洲，瑞士是和平的世外桃源。

sentences.english: Thus, while the urban centres have Xanadu's Huandao the laudatory name.
sentences.chinese: 因此，華麗環島有都市中心的世外桃源這一美稱。

sentences.english: Shandong Yaoxiang national Forest Park, the modern city's land of idyllic beauty.
sentences.chinese: 山東藥鄉國家森林公園，現代都市人的世外桃源。

definition: the Peach Blossom Spring, a hidden land of peace and prosperity/utopia
heaven on Earth/nickname for the city Suzhou
lit. verdant hills and limpid water (idiom)/fig. enchanting scenery
lit. verdant hills and limpid water (idiom)/fig. enchanting scenery
lit. green hills and clear waters/pleasant country scene (idiom)
to be cut off from the rest of the world (idiom)
lit. birdsong and fragrant flowers (idiom); fig. the intoxication of a beautiful spring day
mountains on one side and water on the other
scenic lakes and mountain (idiom); beautiful lake and mountain landscape
Taoyuan county in Changde 常德[Chang2 de2], Hunan/Taoyuan township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
